content: phat pussy hat by alisha bright materials  1 skein hikoo zumie 30% wool 50% acrylic 20% nylon 110 yards 200g color #116  size us15 10mm straight or circular  large eyed tapestry needle for seaming gauge 2sts/1 inch sizes small child adult small adult large 19 x 7 21 x 8 23 x 9 finished dimensions 9 5 x 14 10 5 x 16 11 5 x 18 notes  this hat is worked as a flat rectangle and the sides are seamed using mattress stitch  this yarn will yield 2 small child hats or one of the adult sizes  most children ages 7 and up will fit in the adult small instructions cast on 20 22 24 stitches using the long tail cast on start your cast on with about 45-50 of tail you should have 12-15 left of tail after casting on for seaming up the sides garter stitch brim section 1 knit for 6 row if you want a wider brim you can continue this section as desired stockinette stitch body row 1 wrong side purl all stitches row 2 right side knit all stitches repeat these 2 row until hat measures 12 5 14 5 16 5 complete row 1 one more time garter stitch brim section 2 knit for 5 row or the same number of row minus 1 from section 1 you should be ready to work a ws row bind off all stitches- bind off loosely so this edge matches the same gauge as your cast on edge seaming you should have a tail on each side of your hat using these tails and the technique of either mattress stitch for a professional finish or a whip stitch just to get it done seam together both sides weave in your ends and wear with pride
